Ingredients.2: 3 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces

Ingredients.3: 1 (8 fluid ounce) bottle liquid shrimp and crab boil seasoning

Ingredients.7: 1 tablespoon diced green chile pepper, or to taste

Ingredients.8: 10 pounds medium shrimp - peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Fill a large, 40-quart pot half full with water; bring water to a full boil. Add potatoes, sausage, shellfish boil seasoning, and salt. Cook until potatoes are halfway cooked.

Directions.2: Stir in corn, lemons, and chile pepper; continue boiling until vegetables are tender. Turn off heat.

Directions.3: Mix in shrimp and crab. Cover the pot and let sit until shrimp are pink and crabmeat is opaque and flaky, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove vegetables and shellfish from the pot; drain well. Serve immediately.
